Please note that these trading figures are sold in cases of 12 random figures. Since every figure comes in a sealed box, we cannot promise you what characters will be in a case; please order only if you are willing to accept any of the different items listed. The figures are all precolored and require little-to-no assembly. These figures are a wonderful collectible and perfect for all Gundam fans! Not available for expedited shipping.Built between 1976 and 1982, the EMD GP15- 1 4-axle diesel locomotive was powered by a 12-cylinder EMD 645E engine that generated 1 ,500hp. It was commonly used as a light road switcher or a yard switcher.A total of 310 units were built for American railroads.Features: Scale dimensions and details Directional lighting DCC Ready Blackened metal wheels Dual flywheel equipped 5-pole skewed armature motor with...
